signUp.weKnow: We know you have beautiful and interesting story.
signUp.weWant: We want to help you, writing yours.
signUp.receive: Receive one conversation starter a day. Try it for FREE a month (then just $4.99/month).
signUp.recurring: At Yester is recurring subscription. If you decide to purchase a subscription, an initial payment will be...
createAccount.begin:
Start it's simple. 
Let's begin with your account.
email_valid1: The E-mail Address must be a valid email address.
password_valid1: The Password must be at least 8 characters.
accept_terms1: By continuing signing in you accept our Terms and conditions
protect_lbl1: We'll protect your data as our own and we'll never share with anybody unless you want to.
wisdom_lbl1: They say wisdom comes with the years.
born_lbl1: Let's start by knowing when and where you were born?
lorem_lbl1: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Praesent tincidunt mi ligula. Phasellus erat metus, dictum.
intro_subt2: We'll guide you through daily question that will help us to get the conversation to get started.
intro_subt3: As you, we want to protect your personal information, so you decide when and with who you share it. Always!
regdate_lbl2: That's a great name! Now, let's meet properly to get you started.
regdate_lbl3: When did you saw this beautiful Earth for the first time?
regdate_lbl4: We collect this information to set your experience within the app.
regcountry_lbl3: What a great era for this legend to begin.
regcountry_lbl4: Where in the world did you happen to be born?
regcountry_lbl5: We collect this information to set your experience within the app.
onboarding.step1.title: We cant't wait to hear your story
onboarding.step1.description: Everyone has a story to tell. We know yours is definitely a really interesting one.
onboarding.step2.title: One day, one story
onboarding.step2.description: We'll guide you through daily question that will help us to get the conversation to get started.
onboarding.step3.title: You own your information
onboarding.step3.description: As you, we want to protect your personal information, so you decide when and with who you share it. Always!
